summary: Comprehensive testing of Skillax Digital Marketing Academy Admin CMS features. All 31 backend API tests passed (100%). All frontend features verified: Admin login, Dashboard Overview with stats, Analytics tab with Lead Conversion Funnel and Leads Trend, Blog Management with CRUD operations, Lead Management with filters and export, CourseDetail page with ultra-premium design, Visitor tracking, and Lead capture form submission.
seed_data_creation: Test leads created: statustest@example.com, test_playwright@example.com. Test blogs created and deleted during testing.
context_for_next_testing_agent: All Admin CMS features working correctly. Tested: (1) Admin login with credentials admin@skillax.in / SkillaxAdmin2024!, (2) Dashboard Overview showing Total Leads: 40+, Page Views: 9+, Conversion Rate: 2.6%, Blog Posts: 6, (3) Analytics tab with Lead Conversion Funnel, Leads Trend (Last 7 Days), Most Visited Pages, Traffic Sources, (4) Blog Management with CRUD - create, edit, publish/unpublish, delete, (5) Lead Management with search, status filter, export CSV, status update, (6) CourseDetail page at /courses/professional-digital-marketing with ultra-premium design, (7) Visitor tracking via /api/track/pageview, (8) Lead capture form submission with Thank You confirmation.

admin_login.details: Admin login works with admin@skillax.in / SkillaxAdmin2024!. JWT token generated and stored in localStorage.

dashboard_overview.details: Dashboard shows: Total Leads (40+), Page Views (9+), Conversion Rate (2.6%), Blog Posts (6), Leads by Source chart, Top Pages, Recent Leads list.

analytics_tab.details: Analytics Dashboard shows: Total Page Views, Unique Visitors, Total Leads, Conversion Rate, Lead Conversion Funnel (New/Converted), Leads Trend (Last 7 Days), Most Visited Pages, Traffic Sources.

blog_management.details: Blog Management shows list of blogs with featured images, category badges, publish status. New Post button opens editor with Title, Slug, Category, Tags, Featured Image URL, Author, Excerpt, Content (Markdown). Edit, Publish/Unpublish, Delete actions work.

lead_management.details: Lead Management shows table with Lead, Contact, Interest, Source, Status, Date, Actions columns. Search by name/email, Status filter (All/New/Contacted/Converted/Lost), Export CSV button. Status can be updated via dropdown.

course_detail_page.details: CourseDetail page at /courses/professional-digital-marketing shows ultra-premium design with gradient hero, course title, duration (4 Months), 8+ Certifications badge, 4.9 Rating, stats (500+ Students, 50+ Projects), Enroll Now form, What You'll Learn section (8 skills), 8 Comprehensive Modules curriculum.

visitor_tracking.details: Visitor tracking via /api/track/pageview works. Page views recorded in database. Analytics shows top pages and unique visitors.

lead_capture_form.details: Lead capture form on CourseDetail page works. Form fields: Full Name, Email, Phone, Interested In (course select), Message. Submit shows 'Thank You!' confirmation with 'Submit Another Enquiry' button.

test_files: test_skillax_api.py (17 tests): Health, Admin Auth, Leads, Contact, Courses, Blogs, Chatbot, Analytics
test_admin_cms.py (14 tests): Analytics Summary, Lead Conversion, Leads by Source, Top Pages, Page Views, Visitor Tracking, Leads Management, Blog CRUD
